bio: Jibanyan gone bad. REAL BAD. With an impressive pompadour haircut and classy tails, he's a delinquent with no cause.

soultimate.name: Nyice ta Beatcha
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' attack power for a time.

skill.effect: Attack up by 30% when below 25% HP.
skill.name: Down But Not Out

name: Baddinyan
